item.title: Watch: Food poisoning at BC hostel in Gadwal, 50 students hospitalised
item.description:
<![CDATA[Watch: Food poisoning at BC hostel in Gadwal, 50 students hospitalised
Over 50 students from the BC Hostel in Dharmavaram, Gadwal district, were hospitalised after suspected food poisoning on Friday night. Students reportedly fell ill after dinner, prompting criticism over the governmentâ€™s monitoring of food quality in hostels.
By Telangana Today Published Date - 1 November 2025, 09:48 AM
Jogulamba Gadwal: Over 50 students of the BC Hostel at Dharmavaram under Erravally mandal were hospitalis...]]>
item.author: Telangana Today

item.title: Food poisoning in Gadwal BC hostel, 86 students fall ill after dinner
item.description:
<![CDATA[Hyderabad: A suspected case of food poisoning at a BC hostel in Dharmavaram village of Erravalli mandal, Jogulamba Gadwal district in Telangana, left 86 students ill on Friday night, October 31.
The hostel accommodates 125 students, of whom 110 were present that evening. After dinner, around 9 pm, several students began vomiting and reported uneasiness.
Also Read 10 students fall ill in govt school in Telangana due to food poisoning
Hostel staff, along with local police, quickly arranged ambu...]]>
item.author: News Desk
